    Package index

    All functions

    colors_table
    A table with different colors combinations for the theme
    palette_mediocre_d() palette_mediocre_c()
    Mediocre color palette
    scale_mediocre_d() scale_mediocre_c()
    Mediocre color scales
    set_mediocre_all()
    Sets the mediocre theme and colors for the whole document.
    theme_mediocre() theme_mediocre_map()
    Defines the ggplot theme with the default R colors.
